'''From the Shadows Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|shadows-skin-pack|From the Shadows Skin Pack|October 23, 2018|Tom Stone}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] created by [[4J Studios]], launching in celebration of the 2018 Halloween season. It contains 16 detailed skins (referred to as "HD Skins") themed around creatures of horror.
